text:
Rendering internal Svg in XSL file with fo:instream-foreign-object tag works
with fop 0.91 but do not work with fop 0.92b.

Fop create a buggy PDF.
creator: apeyman@yahoo.com
jeremias@apache.org
text:
Please attach an FO file (not XSLT) that demonstrates the problem. Generally,
SVG works just fine in fo:instream-foreign-object.
resolved invalid due to lack of information
creator: gadams@apache.org
